==Profile==
Padisarah is a young origami hamster created by the Forest Fairy, [[Nilou]], using the unique magic of [[Simulanka]]. After her "birth," she is taken in by [[Almond (NPC)|Grandpa Almond]], an older hamster.

===Appearance===
Padisarah has a light purple body with a white face and belly, and her belly bears a pawprint-shaped mark. Her ears are orange with blue insides, and her eyes are also ringed with orange. She wears a blue neck scarf decorated with a swirl pattern and a yellow flower.
